text:
There are quite a few literal strings such as "mousedown", "text/css" etc in
various places throughout Batik. These literal values exist as SVGConstant
constants, but they do not reference the constants. They should be changed to
use the constants.
creator: richard.beton@roke.co.uk
richard.beton@roke.co.uk
text:
Specific examples include:

"text/css" in SVGStyleSheetProcessingInstruction, SVGOMStyleElement,
SVGOMSVGElement should be CSSConstants.CSS_MIME_TYPE

"mousedown" in BridgeEventSupport.Listener should be
SVGConstants.SVG_EVENT_MOUSEDOWN 
(ditto for the other literal strings in this class)

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
Reassigning all open bugs to the development list.
Sorry for the mass mailing.
